name: Peanut Guy
description:
Storyline

You play as a Peanut in a fantasy world where monsters constantly chase the player. The player needs to reach the finish portal to save his life. Collect the needed keys (5 keys in total), avoid monsters, pass all obstacles, reach the portal and done. Simple as that

Key points

  • There are 5 levels in total
  • Each level has a number of monsters
  • Falling from the ground will send the player to the game over
  • Being hit by deadly obstacles will send the player to the game over
  • Being hit by monsters will send the player to the game over
  • You can jump and sprint
  • Don't forget to collect 5 keys at each level

Control

  • W - Move forward
  • S - Move backward
  • A - Move left
  • D - Move right
  • Left Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse - Control the camera
  • Can be played with Xbox Controller as well
